translations: n．脓胸（复数）：指在胸腔内积聚脓液的病状。
· The doctors treated several cases of empyemas.
医生们治疗了几例脓胸病例。

sentences.sentence: Many patients developed empyemas as a complication of parenchymal disease frequently while (they were) on antimicrobial therapy.
sentences.translation: 多数间质性病变患者并发脓胸，这种状况常见于抗菌素治疗过程中。
